text:
League 1
Brest - PSG: a match in the match!
The match of the 13th day of Ligue 1 between Brest and PSG, will also see a confrontation between the Diallo brothers. Ibrahima side Brest and Abdou Parisian side.
07 Nov 2019, 12:20 by Charlie Creteur



After his victory and more precisely his qualification in the round of 16 Champions League against Galatasaray (1-0), the Parisians found Ligue 1 Sunday. The latter will move to Francis-Le Bl√© stadium on the occasion of the 13th day of Ligue 1, to face Brest. A meeting that will see a confrontation between Abdou Diallo (PSG) and Ibrahima Diallo (Brest).




"This is the first time I'm going to play against my brother Abdou"




Ibrahima Diallo + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Both born in Tours, the Diallo brothers are 3 years apart. Midfielder Ibrahima is 20 years old while Paris summer rookie Abdou is 23 years old.
